thread.title: Missoni Grabs Back with Knitted Pink Pussy Hats in Milan
thread.title_full: Missoni Grabs Back with Knitted Pink Pussy Hats in Milan

title: Missoni Grabs Back with Knitted Pink Pussy Hats in Milan

organizations.name: knitted pink pussy hats share on facebook tweet

text:
Gigi Hadid and the other models were outfitted with the emblematic knit hats. Photo: Jacopo Raule/Getty Images The pink pussy hat got turned on its ear at Milan Fashion Week with high fashion help from the knitwear designers at Missoni. Everyone in the audience received a special Missoni version of the knitted hats seen warming scalps at women’s marches across the country, but that was just for starters. The famous design house ended its show with over 40 models stalking the runway in a veritable parade of pink pussy hats as a sort of mini-protest, including Jamie Bochert, Gigi Hadid, and Angela Missoni herself. According to Vogue , some of the proceeds will go to the ACLU and UN Refugee Agency.
The post-show scene. Photo: Stella Bugbee THe @Missoni models take to the runway in their pussy hats #MFW pic.twitter.com/1ZC6t0HYvr 
— Vanessa Friedman (@VVFriedman) February 25, 2017 ❤Makes me so happy to see all these hard working young woman from many different cultures in the world join together to put on a spectacular show for @missoni today #MFW @gigihadid #WomanThatSupportEachother #LoveThis 
A post shared by YOLANDA (@yolanda.hadid) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:08am PST 
People have the power. Che forza il discorso di Angela Missoni. @missoni #missoni #womensmarch #pinkisthenewblack #missonifw17 #angelamissoni #tiedtogether #milanfashionweek #milanfashionweek2017 #milanomodadonna2017 #milanomodadonna #fashioneditorlife 
A post shared by Pinella Petronio (@pinellapetronio) on Feb 25, 2017 at 5:14am PST
